hero.title: Reach
hero.description: Reach out for a better future!
hero.description2: With your help we hope and believe we can pave a better future for all children around the world .

texts.description: Reach is a platform that connects between volunteer teachers and NGOs concerned with refugee kids around the world.

Unfortunately, under harsh conditions many children get deprived from their basic rights including education. From this point of view, it would be quite helpful to connect these affected children with volunteer teachers that can teach them important skills such as learning local languages or basic coding.

Having this kind of skills could open for them many opportunities in the future that can positively turn their lives around. Thus, the aim of this platform is to provide these kids the opportunity to develop essential skills to thrive and have a better future.

texts.title: Social Sustainability
texts.description: We aim in this project to enrich people's quality of life in fragile environments. One of the best ways to achieve that is to invest in children and help them build their future. In return, they will end up lifting up their communities and enhancing their quality of life.
texts.alt: a drawing of three people working together

texts.title: Education
texts.description: We believe in the importance of education as a key aspect in building a better future. Having a set of talented volunteers around the globe to teach refugee children can create a great impact on their lives. Luckily, with nowadays technologies, we can achieve the optimum education to many kids in harsh environments.
texts.alt: a drawing of two people workers

texts.title: Empathy
texts.description: A world without empathy is ruthless and not worth living in. With this platform, we aim to empower the bond among different groups of people and enrich humanity around the world. Here, we hope to create a large community of volunteers that share common goals including love, empathy, and hope.
texts.alt: a drawing of two people workers

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: Reach out to us if you have any questions ;) Please use this form to contact us, share your feedback, submit a request for assistance or work together to build a better future together.
